cont.entity_a: Cheaper substitutes for handles are available, avoiding high costs of recommended handles. Good value and price, especially with a bubble level.
Built-in levels make it quick. Makes perfect 90-degree bends. Strong for big projects.
cont.entity_b: Recommended for fuel and brake lines. Does not kink large tubing.

cont.entity_a: Gardner Bender tools have easy-to-read arrows. Made of aluminum with a built-in level, well-made.
cont.entity_b: Painted bending surfaces leave smudges as they wear. Not heavy-duty, struggles with hollow steel tubes.
Delivered quickly and has a sturdy build.

cont.entity_a: Only bends 3/4 EMT and 1/2 rigid tube, contrary to product description. Not suitable for 1/2 EMT, requires a different bender.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for 3/16th brake line. Better for larger tubing, not ideal for auto brake lines.

cont.entity_a: Does not provide length measurements for stubs.
Invaluable for careful bending of heavier tubing with a strong handle. Does not include a handle or bending manual.
cont.entity_b: Long handles improve the bending process.
